dct_title_s: Map of the city of New York
dct_description_sm: Covers Manhattan up to 19th St. on the west side and up to 33rd St. on the east side. Also covers parts of Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Shows wards and ferry routes. "Engraved for the Great metropolis for the year 1848." Includes notes. From: The Great metropolis, or guide to New-York. New York : John Doggett, jr., 1848. Historic Maps copy 2 mounted on card; margins trimmed inside neat line.
